DataElement.preferredName: Post Clinical Trial Treatment Regimen Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Value to represent the number of treatment regimens a patient has received since the end date of a specified clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes. Interventions include but are not restricted to drugs, cells and other biological products, surgical procedures, radiologic procedures, devices, behavioral treatments, process-of-care changes, and preventive care._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process._A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.:A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes. Interventions include but are not restricted to drugs, cells and other biological products, surgical procedures, radiologic procedures, devices, behavioral treatments, process-of-care changes, and preventive care.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment.

Concepts.definition: A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Curated to support NCI CRF Standards initiative for Prior/Post Therapy CDEs

Concepts.definition: Determining the number or amount of something.
